title: Refactor dragging to use native canvas events instead of global listeners
description:
Major refactor to replace current global mouse event listener approach with native canvas-only event handling. Current implementation uses global listeners causing sticky/laggy drag behavior. Refactor should:
- Remove all global mouse event listeners
- Use canvas-only mousedown/mousemove/mouseup events
- Simplify state management (eliminate multiple drag flags)
- Add requestAnimationFrame for smooth updates
- Handle edge cases with mouseleave events
- Remove any unnecessary DnD library dependencies
